mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Dr. Sidney Isenberg Collection on Carson McCullers Papers, 1948-1971
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McCullers, Carson, 1917-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a copy of a letter. McCullers discusses her psychological condition with brief mentions of visits and her work.
There are several files available. There is one JPG image for each page of the original document. The PDF was created from scans of the original document and includes all pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: McCullers, Carson, 1917-1967 -- Personal correspondence
Mental illness
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Carson McCullers to [David], July 19, 1941 (correspondence)
